pageProduct.name: Trilogy Certified Organic Rosehip Oil Roller 10ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Trilogy's wild harvested, 100% Certified Organic Rosehip Oil delivers intense all-over nourishment and replenishment for radiantly healthy-looking skin.

Formulated with pure, cold-pressed rosehip seed oil with a minimum 80% essential fatty acid (omega 3 & 6) and fatty acid content (omega 9),this nourishing pure seed oil helps to reduce the appearance of scars, stretch marks, fine lines and wrinkles.

Suitable for all skin types, all-over body and face use. Safe for the whole family and perfect to support growing baby bumps.

Key Benefits:
- Helps reduce the appearance of scars, stretchmarks, fine lines and wrinkles
- Hydrating and easily absorbed
- Nourishing

Warnings

To ensure compatibility we recommend patch testing before first use in the unlikely event of a negative reaction, discontinue use and consult your medical professional.

Common Uses

Nourishes, hydrates and restores skin all-over with 100% pure, certified organic rosehip seed oil.

Ingredients

Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Seed Oil

Directions

Take me on your travels or in your hand bag. Only apply to young scars once wound has completely healed. Do not apply to broken skin.
